original_text: Fathers, do not cause your children to be upset. If you do, they might think that they never do anything that is good.
korean_text: 아비들아 너희 자녀를 노엽게 하지 말지니 낙심할까 함이라

sentences.original_text: Fathers, do not cause your children to be upset
that they never do anything that is good
sentences.korean_translation: 자신이 결코 좋은 일을 하지 않는다고
